EmailTemplate.name: Geode Roundtable 11-17-15.Geode Clubhouse 11-17-15 Webinar
EmailTemplate.subject: Geode Clubhouse: Apache Geode (incubating), November 17, 9AM PST
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Apache Geode (incubating) Roundtable Spring Developers use the Spring Data GemFire API to develop highly scaled low-latency applications using Pivotal GemFire or Apache Geode (incubating).
Join us tomorrow for a Community Roundtable review of what's coming in Apache Geode 1.0 Alpha along with the following topics:
- Geode 1.0 release status - Definition of Done - JIRA update process - Graduation, Maturity model & improvement actions
Roundtable participants include: William Markito, Anthony Baker, Swapnil Bawaskar, Nitin Lamba and others.
No registration is required. Simply join the session here <https://pivotalcommunity.adobeconnect.com/clubhouse/>.
For a reminder, please subscribe to the Apache Geode User Maillist <mailto:user-subscribe@geode.incubator.apache.org>. North America Tuesday, November 17, 2015 9:00AM PST (San Francisco, GMT-07:00) Connecting <https://pivotalcommunity.adobeconnect.com/clubhouse/>
